title: EmATram en solluvEn
sahitya:
EmATram en solluvEn shivanE inda ulaga mAyat-tantira narigaL shei


anupallavi

  nAma japattuDanE nambi iruppOrai nalam keTTa pullargaL kalangiDat-tUTriDum


caraNam    kaNkaNDa poigaL kaTTi viDuginrAr karuNaiyaik-kayavargaL kadamura shuDuginrAr
uNbadilE uppu maN pOTTu sirikkinrAr udaTT-uravuDan vandE uLLattaip-parikkinrAr
maDi nITru Dabbiyaip-poDi Dabbi engirAr mAdait-tAi enbOrai vAdai migha sheiginrAr
kuDiyaik-keDukka vandu maDiyaip-piDikkinra gumbalil en sheivEn ambalavANanE
